name: All For One
description:
This article is about the character. For this character's Quirk, see All For One (Quirk)
All For One (オール・フォー・ワン, Ōru Fō Wan?), real name Shigaraki (死 (し) 柄 (がら) 木 (き) , Shigaraki?), was the former leader and benefactor of the League of Villains, the main antagonist of the Hideout Raid Arc and the overarching antagonist of the series.
Once Japan's most powerful villain and All Might's arch-nemesis, his true motives are unclear and his true identity is unknown. His current goal is to raise Tomura to become his eventual successor. 
He is currently under police custody and imprisoned in Tartarus.

name: Atsuhiro Sako
description:
Atsuhiro Sako (迫 (さこ) 圧 (あつ) 紘 (ひろ) , Sako Atsuhiro?), also known as Mr. Compress (Mr. (ミスター) コンプレス, Misutā Konpuresu?), is a villain affiliated with the League of Villains and was a member of the organization's Vanguard Action Squad. A nationwide wanted thief, he is seen as one of the more 'experienced' members of the league. He and the rest of his team serve as the main antagonists of the Forest Training Camp Arc. 
He later became one of the nine lieutenants of the Paranormal Liberation Front, an organization formed from the remnants of the League and the Meta Liberation Army.
Mr. Compress currently serves as a commander for the "Vanguard Action Support Regiment: Brown" along with Spinner.
kanji: 迫 (さこ) 圧 (あつ) 紘 (ひろ)

He later became one of the nine lieutenants of the Paranormal Liberation Front, an organization formed from the remnants of the League and the Meta Liberation Army.  
Dabi currently serves as a commander for the "Vanguard Action Guerilla Warfare Regiment: Violet" along with Geten.

He was formerly the Pro Hero known as High-Speed Hero: O'Clock (超速ヒーロー・オクロック, Chōsoku Hīrō Okurokku?) in Japan, and Hyper Quadfist (超 (チャオ) 頻 (ピン) 四 (スー) 拳 (チェン) , Chaopin sūchen?) in China.[3]

name: Izuku Midoriya
description:
Izuku Midoriya (緑 (みどり) 谷 (や) 出 (いず) 久 (く) , Midoriya Izuku?), also known as Deku (デク, Deku?), is the primary protagonist of the My Hero Academia manga and anime series.
Though born Quirkless, Izuku manages to catch the attention of the legendary hero All Might due to his innate heroism and strong sense of justice and has since become his close pupil as well as a student in Class 1-A at U.A. High School. All Might passed on his Quirk to Izuku, making him the ninth holder of One For All.
kanji: 緑 (みどり) 谷 (や) 出 (いず) 久 (く)
teams: Team Midoriya (Leader), Shie Hassaikai Raid Team

ages.when: Chapter 3 to Provisional Hero License Exam Arc

name: Jin Bubaigawara
description:
Jin Bubaigawara (分 (ぶ) 倍 (ばい) 河 (がわ) 原 (ら) 仁 (じん) , Bubaigawara Jin?), also known as Twice (トゥワイス, Tuwaisu?),[3] was a Villain affiliated with the League of Villains and was part of its Vanguard Action Squad. He and the rest of his team served as the main antagonists of the Forest Training Camp Arc. 
He later became one of the nine lieutenants of the Paranormal Liberation Front, an organization formed from the remnants of the League and the Meta Liberation Army. Twice also served as the commander for the "Vanguard Action Tactics Regiment: Black" of the aforementioned organization.
kanji: 分 (ぶ) 倍 (ばい) 河 (がわ) 原 (ら) 仁 (じん)
occupation: Villain, Paranormal Liberation Front Lieutenant, Commander of the Black Regiment, )

kanji: 掘 (ほっ) 田 (た) 二 (じ) 郎 (ろう)

This article is about the Nighteye Agency sidekick. For the Class 1-B student known as Mudman, see Juzo Honenuki.

kanji: 百 (も) 足 (あし) 従 (じゅう) 造 (ぞう)

This article is about the character. For this character's Quirk, see Overhaul.

kanji: 治 (ち) 崎 (さき) 廻 (かい)

She worked at Sir Nighteye's hero office as a sidekick along with Centipeder, until Sir Nighteye passed away. She still works at the same office, just as one of Centipeder's (the new boss) sidekicks.
kanji: 泡 (あわ) 田 (た) 薫 (かおる) 子 (こ)

Magne used female pronouns despite her masculine presentation.

He is one of the main antagonists of the Meta Liberation Army Arc. 
He later became one of the nine lieutenants of the Paranormal Liberation Front, an organization formed from the remnants of the League and the Meta Liberation Army.
kanji: 花 (はな) 畑 (ばた) 孔 (こう) 腔 (くう)

name: Kuin Hachisuka

For this subject's current identity, see Bee☆Pop.
Kuin Hachisuka (蜂 (はち) 須 (す) 賀 (か) 九 (く) 印 (いん) , Hachisuka Kuin?) was a student and part-time villain serving the Villain Factory in the spin-off My Hero Academia: Vigilantes.[2] With her Queen Bee Quirk, she possessed Tamao Oguro, the daughter of Knuckleduster.

name: Kurogiri
description:
For this subject's previous identity, see Oboro Shirakumo.
Kurogiri (黒 (くろ) 霧 (ぎり) , Kurogiri?, lit. "Black Fog") is a B-rank villain and a major antagonist in the series as a whole. He is a Nomu created by Doctor Ujiko from the corpse of Oboro Shirakumo to serve and protect Tomura Shigaraki under All For One's command.
He is currently inactive and imprisoned in Tartarus.
kanji: 黒 (くろ) 霧 (ぎり)

kanji: 殻 (がら) 木 (き) 球 (きゅう) 大 (だい)

description: L.A. Villains was a villain team that operated in California, USA.

Spinner currently serves as a commander for the "Vanguard Action Support Regiment: Brown" along with Mr. Compress.

name: Tomoyasu Chikazoku
description:
Tomoyasu Chikazoku (近 (ちか) 属 (ぞく) 友 (とも) 保 (やす) , Chikazoku Tomoyasu?), also known by the code name Skeptic (スケプティック, Sukeputikku?), is a board member at Feel Good, Inc. who was secretly a leading member of the modern Meta Liberation Army. He is one of the main antagonists of the Meta Liberation Army Arc.
He later became one of the nine lieutenants of the Paranormal Liberation Front, an organization formed from the remnants of the League and the Meta Liberation Army. 
Skeptic currently serves as a commander for the "Vanguard Action Intelligence Regiment: Carmine" along with Himiko Toga.

name: Tomura Shigaraki
description:
Tomura Shigaraki (死 (し) 柄 (がら) 木 (き) 弔 (とむら) , Shigaraki Tomura?), real name Tenko Shimura (志 (し) 村 (むら) 転 (てん) 弧 (こ) , Shimura Tenko?), is the leader of the League of Villains after his master All For One's defeat and arrest, and the primary antagonist of the series. He made his first major appearance as one of the main antagonists of the U.S.J. Arc. Like the rest of the League, his goal is to kill All Might, the "Symbol of Peace," thus destroying the society he represents and to create a new one with a new form of justice in his own image.
Later on, Tomura changed his goal to instead, destroy society all together rather than reshape it. He soon merged his organization and the Meta Liberation Army to form the Paranormal Liberation Front, becoming its Grand Commander.
kanji: 死 (し) 柄 (がら) 木 (き) 弔 (とむら)

name: Toshinori Yagi
description:
Toshinori Yagi (八 (や) 木 (ぎ) 俊 (とし) 典 (のり) , Yagi Toshinori?), more commonly known by his hero name, All Might (オールマイト, Ōru Maito?), is the tritagonist of My Hero Academia. All Might is the former No. 1 Pro Hero who bore the title of the world's Symbol of Peace (平和の象徴, Heiwa no Shōchō?). He teaches Foundational Hero Studies at U.A. High School.
All Might was the eighth holder of the One For All Quirk after receiving it from Nana Shimura. He has since passed the torch to Izuku Midoriya, whom he is training to be his successor. After using up all the embers of One For All to defeat All For One, All Might retired and ended his era as the world's greatest hero.
kanji: 八 (や) 木 (ぎ) 俊 (とし) 典 (のり)
